name: OUROBOROS (itch) (undefinist)
description:
Hey! Managed to have time for LD35! :)
Sadly, I didn't do so well this time. I'm too tired to finish it up

Anyways, this game is called OUROBOROS, and is about an infinitely long snakething trying to eat it's own tail.
Gameplay wise, kinda like hokohum mashed with flywrench.

Oh, and A/D or left/right to move.
